description: During the [SolarWinds Compromise](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0024), [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) used [AdFind](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0552) to enumerate domain groups.(Citation: CrowdStrike StellarParticle January 2022)

external_references.description: CrowdStrike. (2022, January 27). Early Bird Catches the Wormhole: Observations from the StellarParticle Campaign. Retrieved February 7, 2022.
